title.rendered: Medical Camp for the people of Sanjeevini Nagar

content.rendered: People from Sanjeevini Nagar benefited from a health camp conducted on the 4th of October 2016. Camp benefits consisted of full medical care including OPD, supply of drugs, dressings, pathological and radiological investigations (diabetic, haemoglobin, ECG, Nebulisation, urine and blood check up), antenatal and postnatal services. Special care was given to the patients and emergency treatment was started to the needy patient. Referrals were very few because 90 percent of diagnosis and treatment were given on the spot. 48 women above the age of 18 years, 14 men, 4 adolescent girls and 9 boys availed the medical services.
